mapper.select: select '100' as sys_id, t2.*, t3.FORM_NAME, t3.DESCRIPTION from (select rownum as rnum, HOUSE_CODE, VENDOR_CODE, ADD_DATE, ADD_TIME from DTOADM.CONTRACT_COMPANY) t1 inner join DTOADM.CONTRACT_COMPANY t2 on (t1.HOUSE_CODE = t2.HOUSE_CODE and t1.VENDOR_CODE = t2.VENDOR_CODE and t1.ADD_DATE = t2.ADD_DATE and t1.ADD_TIME = t2.ADD_TIME ) left join DTOADM.CONTRACT_FORM t3 on (t2.FORM_TYPE = t3.FORM_TYPE and t2.FORM_SEQ = t3.FORM_SEQ ) where rnum > #{start} and rnum <= #{end}
